Detailed Description

Qt-based implementation of application environment information.

virtual QStringList iqt::CProcessEnvironment::GetApplicationArguments ( ) const [virtual]

Returns the arguments of command line for running application process.

Implements isys::IProcessEnvironment.

virtual EnvironmentVariables iqt::CProcessEnvironment::GetEnvironmentVariables ( ) const [virtual]

Returns the environment variables of the application process.

The key of the EnvironmentVariables map is the name of the environment variable.

Implements isys::IProcessEnvironment.

virtual int iqt::CProcessEnvironment::GetMainThreadId ( ) const [virtual]

Get current thread ID.

Implements isys::IProcessEnvironment.

virtual QString iqt::CProcessEnvironment::GetModulePath ( bool  useApplicationModule = false,
bool  onlyDirectory = false 
) const [virtual]

Returns the module file name.

If the useApplicationModule is true returns the name of application file/directory, otherwise the file name or (directory path) of module in which context this function was called. if onlyDirectory is true only directory path will be returned.

Implements isys::IProcessEnvironment.

Returns the standard temp path, that will be used by the application.

Implements isys::IProcessEnvironment.
